general.Getting Started:
# Welcome!
discord.js is an easy-to-use and intuitive JavaScript library that wraps around the Discord API.

meta.name: Client

functions.name: login
functions.description: Logs the client in. If successful, resolves with the account's token.

params.description:
The email or token used for the account. If it is an email, a password _must_ be
provided.
params.name: emailOrToken

params.description: The password for the account, only needed if an email was provided.
params.name: password

properties.name: user
properties.description: The User of the logged in Client, only available after `READY` has been fired.

meta.name: TextChannel
meta.description: Represents a Server Text Channel on Discord.

functions.name: deleteDM
functions.description: Deletes a DM Channel (if one exists) between the Client and the User. Resolves with the Channel if successful.

properties.name: discriminator
properties.description: A discriminator based on username for the User

properties.name: avatar
properties.description: The ID of the user's avatar

properties.name: bot
properties.description: Whether or not the User is a Bot.

properties.name: status
properties.description:
The status of the user:

* **`online`** - user is online
* **`offline`** - user is offline
* **`idle`** - user is AFK

meta.name: VoiceChannel
meta.description: Represents a Server Voice Channel on Discord.
